text: We are looking for a Python developer with Django experience.
Must have strong knowledge of AWS and Docker containers.
Must know Docker and AWS for cloud deployment.
Experience in Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices.
Experience with SQL databases and Git version control.
React frontend experience is a plus.
Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering with 3 - 5 years of related professional experience.
Strong fundamentals in electromagnetics (EM), transmission lines and microwave theory, Signal and Power Integrity.
Experience in using 2-D and 3-D EM simulation tools such as Ansys HFSS, SI-Wave, Cadence Clarity, CST Studio Suite, HyperLynx.
Frequency domain and time domain knowledge of high speed signaling.
Experience with channel simulations using MATLAB, ADS or other tools.
Power plane design, modeling and analysis using tools like PowerSI, Ansys SIwave.
Familiarity with IC package or PCB layout tools like Cadence APD, Mentor PADS, Xpedition Package Designer.
Working knowledge of circuit design tools (e.g. Spectre, ADS, HSpice, Ansys Electronics Desktop Circuit Design).
Working experience or knowledge of memory protocols and interfaces, like GDDR5, GDDR6, HBM, LPDDR.
Knowledge of the thermal and mechanical analysis of the IC package development.
Experience as a Backend Developer, IoT Engineer, DevOps Engineer or similar roles.
Some experience with JavaScript or similar.
You have hands-on experience in Java (Kotlin) or Python and REST APIs – with a good understanding of containerisation.
Experience with designing and building event driven applications, and you have experience with Kafka or similar brokers.
Professional experience working in an IoT context or the Energy Market.
Experience working with Thingsboard.
We think you’ll be best geared for success if you can meet the following requirements:
It goes without saying that so-called ‘soft skills’ are just as important as their ‘hard’ cousins.
You enjoy teamwork and are used to agile/scrum ways of working.
Expertise in Premiere Pro
Experience using BlazeDS, VMWare Workspace ONE and Certified Tester Expert Level

Creative storytelling skills with a keen eye for visual composition and detail

Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
